query:
SELECT
            id,
            user_id as user_id,
            name,
            unread_count,
            total_count
        FROM admin_email_folders
        WHERE user_id = $1
        ORDER BY
            CASE name
                WHEN 'Inbox' THEN 1
                WHEN 'Sent' THEN 2
                WHEN 'Drafts' THEN 3
                WHEN 'Archive' THEN 4
                WHEN 'Trash' THEN 5
                WHEN 'Spam' THEN 6
                ELSE 7
            END
